videos.alt_text: adidas Originals - Original Is Never Finished
videos.title: adidas Originals - Original Is Never Finished (2018)
videos.description: The second installment of the now iconic Original is Never Finished campaign. We'd identify this clip as a pedestal shot VFX breakdown. As we ascend higher, the post-production begins to fall away until all that is left is the studio it was shot in.
videos.additional_info:
adidas Originals - Original Is Never Finished (2018)
The second installment of the now iconic Original is Never Finished campaign. We'd identify this clip as a pedestal shot VFX breakdown. As we ascend higher, the post-production begins to fall away until all that is left is the studio it was shot in.
Technique - BTS , Pedestal
Director - Manu Cossu

videos.description: The second installment of the now iconic Original is Never Finished campaign. This shot begins with a pedestal upwards into an analogue glitch. It transitions into a traditional trucking shot right but with one of the skaters duplicating near the end.

videos.title: Scott Pilgrim vs. the World (2010)
videos.description: In this offbeat romantic comedy, Michael Cera is Scott Pilgrim, the underachieving musician on a quest to win a record deal by facing off against seven evil exes to impress his girlfriend, Ramona Flowers (Mary Elizabeth Winstead). Because nothing says love like defeating exes in epic bass battles—just your typical, everyday relationship hurdles.

videos.alt_text: adidas Originals - Original Is Never Finished
videos.title: adidas Originals - Original Is Never Finished (2018)
videos.description: The second installment of the now iconic Original is Never Finished campaign. This shot features an upward moving Trucking Pedestal in conjunction with Duplication and a wipe transition near the end, using the pillars as a device to change characters. Unlike Conveyor shots, which move left to right along a dolly track, the pedestal moves up and down, either practically (or like in this example) with the help of post-production VFX.
videos.additional_info:
adidas Originals - Original Is Never Finished (2018)
The second installment of the now iconic Original is Never Finished campaign. This shot features an upward moving Trucking Pedestal in conjunction with Duplication and a wipe transition near the end, using the pillars as a device to change characters. Unlike Conveyor shots, which move left to right along a dolly track, the pedestal moves up and down, either practically (or like in this example) with the help of post-production VFX.
Technique - Pedestal , Trucking
Director - Manu Cossu
DOP - Mattias Rudh
Editor - Christie Brown, Gian Buazulli
Colorist - Company 3, Tom Poole
Original Source - Link
INTERIOR
PEDESTAL

videos.title: A$AP Rocky - A$AP Forever (2018)
videos.description: A$AP Rocky returns as the "fashion killa" in the music video for his latest single, "A$AP Forever," featuring Moby. Directed by Dexter Navy, the video features Rocky and the A$AP Mob in various New York locations, with a cameo by Moby, credited for the heavy sampling of his 1999 hit "Porcelain."
videos.additional_info:
